philosophy.title: Design Philosophy
philosophy.headline: Drawing California's Soul with Eastern Ink.
philosophy.headline_cn: 以东方之笔，绘加州之境。
philosophy.description: At GreenPoint, we believe landscaping is not conquering nature, but honoring the earth through 'Negative Space' (Liu Bai). We fuse the serenity of Kyoto's Zen gardens with the vibrant freedom of the California coast. By using native drought-tolerant flora, we craft spaces that embody modern living while holding a deep spiritual essence.
philosophy.description_cn: 在 GreenPoint，我们相信园林不是对自然的征服，而是对大地的“留白”。我们融合了京都禅寺的静谧尺度与加州海岸的明亮自由，利用当地抗旱植物营造出既符合现代生活方式，又具有深厚精神内核的景观空间。

home.philosophy_quote: “We believe the finest landscape architecture does not occupy space, but awakens the memory of the land. Through borrowed scenery, framing, and metaphor, we cultivate a poetic world—habitable, traversable, and deeply observable—within every square inch.”
home.philosophy_quote_cn: “我们相信，最好的景观设计不是对场地的占领，而是对土地记忆的唤醒。借景、框景、隐喻，在方寸之间营造出可游、可居、可观的诗意世界。”
